name: LightOut (itch)
description:
The story of the insidious kidnapping of the protagonist's mother and the incredible difficulties that he has to overcome in order to save her.

Lots of different dialogues. Don't miss them and read carefully. Written with love.

This game was made during SCREAM JAM 2020

Also worked on the game:

Mironenko Nikita

Сontrol:

WASD - character movement.

To interact with objects use mouse.

Enjoy the game!
